response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier product. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
